front.title: IEEE Recommended Practice for the Maintenance of Industrial and Commercial Power Systems
front.keyword: failure effect; failure mode; failure modes and effects analysis; failure modes
and criticality analysis; hidden/latent failure; maintenance; predictive maintenance; preventive maintenance; probability; reliability; reliability-centered maintenance; safety-related work practices
front.abstract: This recommended practice covers the maintenance of industrial and commercial power systems. It covers the fundamentals of electrical equipment maintenance, how to develop successful maintenance strategies, and the common testing methods used as part of an electrical equipment maintenance program.
